#summary How to uninstall Top Draw.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

There are three components to Top Draw:  the viewer, the editor, and an application support folder.  The rest of this page will describe how you can remove these components.

= Details =

Viewer
  # Go to the icon in the Menubar and Quit.
  # Open the System Preferences pane, and choose Accounts.
  # Select the Login Items tab
  # Remove the Top Draw Viewer entry (if present)

Editor
  # Drag the Top Draw application to the Trash

Application Support
  # Navigate to your Home directory
  # Navigate into Library > Application Support > Google directory
  # Drag the TopDraw folder to the Trash
